verses.verse: Why <S%H5975>standest<s%> thou afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? Why <S%H5956>hidest<s%> thou thyself in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>?

In the <S%H1346>pride<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> is hotly <S%H1814>pursued<s%>; Let them be <S%H8610>taken<s%> in the <S%H4209>devices<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> they have <S%H2803>conceived<s%>.

For the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1984>boasteth<s%> of his <S%H5315>heart<s%>'s <S%H8378>desire<s%>, And the <S%H1214>covetous<s%> <S%H1288>renounceth<s%>, <S%H5006>yea<s%>, contemneth <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, in the <S%H1363>pride<s%> of his <S%H639>countenance<s%>, <S%H1875>saith<s%>, He will not require <S%H4209>it<s%>. All his thoughts <S%H430>are<s%>, There is no God.

His <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H2342>firm<s%> at all <S%H6256>times<s%>; Thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are far <S%H4791>above<s%> out of his <S%H6887>sight<s%>: As for all his adversaries, he puffeth at <S%H6315>them<s%>.
He <S%H559>saith<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, I shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>; To all <S%H1755>generations<s%> I shall not be in <S%H7451>adversity<s%>.

His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H423>cursing<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit<s%> and <S%H8496>oppression<s%>: Under his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.

He <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> in the <S%H3993>lurking-places<s%> of the <S%H2691>villages<s%>; In the secret <S%H3993>places<s%> doth he <S%H2026>murder<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent<s%>; His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are privily <S%H6845>set<s%> against the <S%H2489>helpless<s%>.

He <S%H693>lurketh<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in his <S%H5520>covert<s%>; He lieth in <S%H693>wait<s%> to <S%H2414>catch<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%>: He doth <S%H2414>catch<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, when he <S%H4900>draweth<s%> him in his <S%H7568>net<s%>.
He <S%H1794>croucheth<s%>, he <S%H7817>boweth<s%> <S%H2489>down<s%>, And the helpless <S%H5307>fall<s%> by his strong <S%H6099>ones<s%>.
He <S%H559>saith<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, <S%H410>God<s%> hath <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>; He <S%H5641>hideth<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>; he will <S%H5331>never<s%> see <S%H7200>it<s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; O <S%H410>God<s%>, lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: <S%H7911>Forget<s%> not the <S%H6035>poor<s%>.
Wherefore doth the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5006>contemn<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, And <S%H559>say<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, Thou wilt not require <S%H1875>it<s%>?

Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5027>it<s%>; for thou beholdest <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H3708>spite<s%>, to <S%H5414>requite<s%> it with thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: The <S%H2489>helpless<s%> <S%H5800>committeth<s%> himself unto <S%H5826>thee<s%>; Thou hast been the helper of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>.

Break <S%H7665><s%> thou the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; And as for the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1875>man<s%>, seek out his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> till thou <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1077>none<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H4428>King<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>: The <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H6>perished<s%> out of his <S%H776>land<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6035>meek<s%>: Thou wilt <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, thou wilt cause thine <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H7181>hear<s%>;
To <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H1790>oppressed<s%>, That <S%H582>man<s%> who is of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may be <S%H6206>terrible<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%>.
